title: Enhance SpellCheckComponent to automatically build on firstSearcher in case of RAMDirectory based indices
description: The spellcheck compnent currently does not automatically reload when a RAMDirectory is used. Is it possible to reload a RAMDirectory spell check index using firstSearcher?
